    • Method Detail

      • getInvitedParseIds

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getInvitedParseIds()
        Returns the parse ids of the invited users. This includes users who have already clicked attending or not attending.
        Returns:
        list of parse ids

      • openInviteDialog

        public void openInviteDialog()
        Builds and opens up the invite dialog popup.

      • resetInviteHelper

        public void resetInviteHelper(java.util.List<java.lang.String> savedInvitedParseIds)
        Resets the invite helper once the event is saved. Clears the list of invited parse user ids and the list of indices. Filters the array of friend names to contain only the ones that haven't been invited yet
        Parameters:
        savedInvitedParseIds - list of the parse ids of users that have already been invited.
